exact_quotes: I am specifically looking for a hyper honest/transparent senior engineer who fully understands the capability of Claude AI coding and is comfortable with their work being fact checked daily by another senior engineer
I need to build an MVP as quickly as possible (1-2 weeks maximum)
I am okay with sacrificing quality/perfectness to achieve my timeline but the app must be functional for at least 1000 users
pain_points: Need MVP built extremely fast (1-2 weeks)
Tight timeline with quality trade-offs acceptable
Urgent hiring deadline (end of day Wednesday)

vague_requirements.client_says: We are drawing 99% inspiration from a similar app in the market
vague_requirements.clarifying_question: Which similar app should we reference? Can you share the app name or screenshots?

vague_requirements.client_says: I can either provide wireframes or you can do this yourself using AI
vague_requirements.clarifying_question: Do you have wireframes ready, or should I proceed with AI-generated wireframes based on the reference app?
What is the budget range for this project? What hourly rate are you considering?

red_flags.flag: Extremely tight timeline (1-2 weeks for full MVP)
red_flags.concern: Risk of scope creep or unrealistic expectations
red_flags.mitigation: Clarify core MVP features vs nice-to-haves, set clear boundaries

red_flags.flag: Daily code reviews by external engineer
red_flags.mitigation: Establish review process and response time expectations
